summary: This test suite validates the behavior of AWS Simple Workflow Service (SWF) activity type operations using a mocked boto3 client. It covers registering, describing, listing, deprecating, and undeprecating activity types, as well as handling error scenarios such as attempts on nonâ€‘existent or already (de)deprecated types.
business_intent: Ensure that the application correctly manages the lifecycle of SWF activity types and gracefully handles error conditions when interacting with AWS services.
